User has the responsibility to obtain export ; licenses, or other export authority as may be required before exporting such ; information to foreign countries or providing access to foreign persons. ;- pro hiihat_assert, statement, text, title=title if not statement then begin error_msg = "ASSERT FAILURE: "+text if keyword_set(title) then begin ;; if title set, use a dialogbox ok = dialog_message(error_msg, title=title) endif else print,error_msg retall stop endif end
